import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const Cards = ({movie}) => { const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setIsLoading(false) }, 1500) }, []) return <> { isLoading ?
:
{movie?movie.original_title:""}
{movie?movie.release_date:""} {movie?movie.vote_average:""}
{movie ? movie.overview.slice(0,118)+"..." : ""}
} } export default Cards
